Notes.Text:
This update for nmap fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-15173: Fixed a remote denial of service attack via a crafted TCP-based service (bsc#1104139).

Non-security issue fixed:

- Add missing runtime dependency python-xml which prevented zenmap from starting (bsc#1133512).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: Nmap through 7.70, when the -sV option is used, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack consumption and application crash) via a crafted TCP-based service.
